actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Honoring the life and achievements of Dame Lois Browne Evans, Bermuda's first female barrister, Attorney General, and Opposition Leader in the British Commonwealth.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the House of Representatives' profound sympathy to the family of Dame Lois Browne Evans and the citizens of Bermuda over the passing of Dame Lois Browne Evans. Commends the lifetime achievements of Dame Lois Browne Evans, her commitment to public service, and the pioneering role she played for women and minorities.

titles.title: Honoring the life and achievements of Dame Lois Browne Evans, Bermuda's first female barrister, Attorney General, and Opposition Leader in the British Commonwealth.
